alert.note: Alert for La Paz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 22 at 7:21PM MST until September 22 at 11:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of west central Arizona, including the following county, La Paz. * WHEN...Until 1030 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Flow in normally dry washes will cause a hazard at unbridged road crossings. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 721 PM MST, Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Ehrenberg Wash, Lake Wash, Weaver Wash, Mule Wash, Limekiln Wash, Mohave Wash, Petes Wash, and Tyson Wash. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Ehernberg-Cibola Road. Otherwise, mainly rural areas of West- central La Paz County. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
